title: The.Big.Bang.Theory.S06.1080pRip.XviD-terpsfan101
description:
The.Big.Bang.Theory.S06.1080pRip.XviD-terpsfan101

I'm not satisfied with how the audio donwmix turned out. It is too loud, which I could probably fix by normalizing to a lower value (but what value?), and has too much bass (probably something to do with the dynamic compression). I will have to do some research on how to properly downmix audio. If I can get it to sound better, I'll upload another torrent. Until then, these will have to do.

Source: The.Big.Bang.Theory.S06.1080p.BluRay.x264-SHORTBREHD
AviSynth Script:

LoadPlugin("C:Program Files (x86)AviSynth 2.5pluginsffms2.dll")
Import("C:Program Files (x86)AviSynth 2.5pluginsFFMS2.avsi")
FFmpegSource2("c:The.Big.Bang.Theory.S06.1080p.BluRay.x264-SHORTBREHD [PublicHD]the.big.bang.theory.s06e15.1080p.bluray.x264-shortbrehd.mkv")
ColorMatrix(mode="Rec.709->Rec.601")
Spline36Resize(624, 352)

Audio Conversion: DTS 5.1ch 1509 kbps -> Downmix to 2ch stereo WAV with DynamicRange Compression applied and Peaks Normalized to 100 during conversion -> MP3 LameACM 130 ABR
